rooms.description: A welcoming area with minimalist design and neutral colors. It includes a coat closet.
Spacious living room designed in Scandinavian style with natural light accentuating clean lines.
Functional kitchen integrated with dining area. Features energy-efficient appliances and storage solutions.
Spacious master bedroom oriented in a favorable Vastu direction with an en-suite bathroom.
Master bathroom attached to the master bedroom.
Dedicated study and library space with built-in shelves, ample lighting, and a quiet atmosphere.
Functional guest bedroom that adheres to Scandinavian minimalism. It can double as an extra workspace if needed.
Fourth bedroom designed with simplicity and functionality in mind, suitable for children or additional guests.
Compact but well-equipped private gym located on the ground floor. Features essential exercise equipment and storage area.
Outdoor swimming pool area with a basic design that aligns with budget constraints, complemented by surrounding deck space.
